page.title: 14Football in Collingham
page.content: The{football club }was formed in 1900. It is very well supported and has facilities which many clubs in larger areas would envy.There are 3 pitches and a total of 9 different teams are fielded ranging from 11 year olds to mens teams.There is an excellent youth policy in the club with the boys being encouraged and coached from an early age.The changing and{social {facilities }are of a high standard and at present the club has 186 members. Apart from football,other games and sports are played.Snooker,darts,cards and dominoes can be enjoyed in the evening.{A hockey team}is about to be started and {a bowling green }will soon be ready for use. It is a very friendly club,open to all and it provides healthy recreation for the youngsters of the village.
